member.name: DXGI_MODE_DESC1
member.summary: Describes a display mode and whether the display mode supports stereo.

member.name: DXGI_MODE_DESC1.Width
member.summary: A value that describes the resolution width.

member.name: DXGI_MODE_DESC1.Height
member.summary: A value that describes the resolution height.

member.name: DXGI_MODE_DESC1.RefreshRate
member.summary: A structure that describes the refresh rate in hertz.

member.name: DXGI_MODE_DESC1.Format
member.summary: A -typed value that describes the display format.

member.name: DXGI_MODE_DESC1.ScanlineOrdering
member.summary: A DXGI_MODE_SCANLINE_ORDER-typed value that describes the scan-line drawing mode.

member.name: DXGI_MODE_DESC1.Scaling
member.summary: A DXGI_MODE_SCALING-typed value that describes the scaling mode.

member.name: DXGI_MODE_DESC1.Stereo
member.summary: Specifies whether the full-screen display mode is stereo. TRUE if stereo; otherwise, FALSE.
